name: @indent/gcloud-github-teams-webhook
description: A Node.js starter for Google Cloud Functions with Indent and GitHub Teams.

scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:dist; npm run clean:tf; npm run clean:modules
scripts.create:all: npm run deploy:init; npm run deploy:all
scripts.deploy:all: npm install; npm run build; npm run tf:apply -auto-approve
scripts.deploy:debug: npm install; npm run build; npm run tf:debug
scripts.destroy:all: npm run tf:destroy -auto-approve; npm run clean:all

author: Indent Inc <open@indent.com>
